duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate autoclaves and equipment to clean, decontaminate, and sterilize instruments and equipment.
Inspect and assemble instruments, trays, and packs.
Coordinate, assemble, and distribute supplies, equipment, and instruments for surgical cases.
Clean, decontaminate, disassemble, and sterilize instruments and supplies.
Assist in maintaining consistent and continuous workflow for superior customer service.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent preferred.
Certification from IAHCSMM as a Certified Registered Central Service Tech (CRCST), or certification from CBSPD as a Certified Sterile Processing and Distribution Tech (CSPDT) within one year of hire.
